result.name: sick-absence-quarterly-information
result.notes: Sick absence information reported quarterly to Cabinet Office (one quarter in arrears). Includes breakdown of sick absence by long and short term sick, cost of sick, staff employed during the period, staff with no sick together with a breakdown by: geographic region, gender, grade, and absence reason.

organization.name: home-office
organization.title: Home Office
organization.description:
The Home Office leads on immigration and passports, drugs policy, crime policy and counter-terrorism and works to ensure visible, responsive and accountable policing in the UK.

Home Office is a ministerial department, supported by 26 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/home-office

result.title: Sick absence quarterly information

extras.value: Release of this dataset is dependent on implementation of IT system and ability to redact personal data to ensure anonymity
